entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CopyLocalLockFileAssemblies changes the behavior of AutoGenerateBindingRedirects for good #35093

PullRequests

Created

  • add --no-http-cache option #35107
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Side by side workload manifests and garbage collection for file based installs #35106
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35102
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #35100
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade for different versions for dotnet tool install #35088
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Fix CanSortByDownloadCountAndThenByName test by using CurrentCulture … #35084
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35068
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.309 #35073
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Fix CanSortByDownloadCountAndThenByName test by using CurrentCulture … #35083
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add DOTNET_LAUNCH_PROFILE environment when invoking dotnet run #35029
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Move to granular opt-in for interceptors preview #35024
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [main] Update dotnet/runtime #35048
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2258161 #34880
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid loading all types when invoking Hot Reload handlers, handle type load failures #35077
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update branding to 7.0.112 #35072
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Download tool packages from NuGet feeds directly, instead of implicitly restoring #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
